channel.title: Performance on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Performance on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PHP, scalability & filesystems
item.description: In this third article in the performance series we started last year, we’ll talk about PHP, scalability and its impact on the filesystem!

item.title: Apache vs. NGINX: Match of the Millennium
item.description: Here is the second article in the performance series we started last year, dealing with the old feud between Apache and NGINX.

item.title: Performance (& PrestaShop)
item.description: Introducing a new series of article to talk about performance, benchmarking and PrestaShop!

item.title: About the 1.7.2.2 performance improvement
item.description: A small line might have gone unnoticed in the PrestaShop 1.7.2.2 release announcement: “1.7 front-end should now be faster than 1.6’s for popular stores”. What does it apply to, and how did we test for such performances? Here’s how.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.6.1.0: a new level of performances
item.description: A lot of things have been improved on PrestaShop 1.6.1.0:
